## Installing R2MLwiN

R2MLwiN is based on MLwiN. To use it:

 1. Sign up for an academic account at https://www.cmm.bristol.ac.uk/clients/reqform/
 2. Download `mlnscript` for MacOS/linux by filling in form at https://www.cmm.bristol.ac.uk/clients/softwaredownload/
 3. Open the installer (.dmg, .rpm, etc) and save the files to `/opt/mln`.
 
## Installing R dependencies

You can install the dependencies from `renv.lock` by running `renv::restore()`.

## Running the null model

Run:

```
source('multilevel_analysis.R')
```
